sentences.sContent: Not only this will happen but you will also look for his slightest mistakes then use them as proofs for what you have been told about him!!
sentences.sContent_eng: Not only this will happen but you will also look for his slightest mistakes then use them as proofs for what you have been told about him!!
sentences.sCn: 不仅这个将会发生，而且你也会寻找他最轻微的错误，然后将此作为他人告诉你他是怎么样的人的证据。

sentences.sContent: " so we can look for those features.
sentences.sCn: 这样我们就可以寻找那些特征。
